title: Cant install the game
body:
Hey i had a problem with the game causing "trying to recconect" every time im trying to play the game ( I DONT HAVE INTERNET ISSUES , IN OTHER GAMES EVERYTHING WORKS PERFECTLEY!)
so i deleted the game and tried to download it again ok everything is cool for now i install the ExE. trying to lunch the game and ...

BOOM!



"PvP. net Kerchel patcher has stopped working " error something like that ..
dont know what to do i even tried to download a folder where the game is already installed and nothing ..


AND i tried to lunch the game as administrator of course and nothing  ..

Plus all my drivers are updated so no drivers issues ..

replies.body:
I appreciate your efforts in getting this fixed up, and I want to help get you to the finish line!  Just as a heads, even if your internet is perfect you can still have problems reaching specific services.  In this case, though, a kernel error would happen if a security setting is blocking you from reaching the patching service.  Go over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your OS or other software is allowing League as an exception.

Also, grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and use it to auto-configure your firewall settings.

I hope that helps!
